title: How to Make Game Controller Cookies

text: Grab your bowl. Cream together the butter and sugar. Take 2 sticks of butter (which is one cup) and a half cup of sugar. Mix until creamy and fluffy. Now, add 1 egg, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract, half a cup of greek yogurt and mix together until smooth.  Add the dry ingredients. These means add the flour, salt, cinnamon and baking soda. Mix everything together until the mixture becomes doughy. Take a piece of cling film and lay it flat down on a surface. Get your dough and start squeezing the mixture together so it stays there. Roll the dough to a square shape and wrap it in the cling film. Put it in the fridge for an hour. After an hour, take your dough out of the fridge and unwrap it. Take a little bit of flour and sprinkle it over a surface. Roll the dough out flat. Take your cookie cutters and start cutting. Make sure you press down on any details. Pop your cookies in the oven with a temperature of around 350 degree's. Let them bake for 5-6 minutes. As soon as they start to turn golden brown, they are done. Let your cookie's have plenty of time to cool. Let them sit for about a half hour. Outline the Wii controller with the white frosting, then fill in the middle. Frost your PS3 black and your Xbox white. Now, let them set for 10 minutes. Add any more details with other colours. Set on a plate and eat! Finished.
